main_definition: A term referring to a person with dark hair, or it can also denote someone who has used the color brown in various contexts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describing a female individual with naturally brownish-black colored hair
meanings_and_examples.example: She is known as a stunning brunette on social media.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A character or person in literature, film, etc., who has dark hair color
meanings_and_examples.example: The protagonist of the novel was described as a charismatic brunette with deep brown eyes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to describe something that is colored brown or contains shades of brown
meanings_and_examples.example: He chose a beautiful brown, or in other words, brunette-colored dress for the wedding.
